alert.note: Alert for Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 5:35PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rosebud County through 615 PM MDT... At 535 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lame Deer, or 15 miles south of Colstrip, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. Also heavy rain producing localized flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lame Deer and Northern Cheyenne Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
